website_summaries.verdict: Cute, colorful and oh so portable mini-cupcake maker. Bakes 6 cakes in under 10 minutes and ready to devour.
pros: Comes with lifting fork and cupcake liners to help make yummy desserts
Easy to clean, thanks to non-stick plates
cons: May not brown the tops of muffins or cupcakes enough, and size of final product may be too small

customer_reviews.title: Bring on the frosting.....
customer_reviews.text: This is a xmas gift for my youngest niece who is getting into the baking thing. Thought this is better than having to turn on the oven. Won't know how it performs until she tries it. But it looks well built.
customer_reviews.author: BigMigz

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING !!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! It makes 6 cupcakes in 5-6 mins!!! I luv this product! It took me by suprise! :) I TOTALLY RECOMEND THIS!!!!!!! It comes with the maker, cupcake liners, and a fork like thing. If you buy this, I would RECOMEND getting the Wilton Desert Decorator PLUS. This really helps when you frost the cupcakes:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I'm so glad I got this
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know if I should get yet another kitchen toy, I mean tool, but I'm so glad I got this. It is really fun and fast to make cupcakes or whatever. I make mini cornbread in there using Jiffy mix and they turn out great!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for snacks
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 9 year old for Christmas. She loves it! I don't feel that all the cupcakes cooked evenly in it but it wasn't a huge deal. For a quick snack it is perfect! Just take it out of the box and it's ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: LegitMama

customer_reviews.title: Our 11 year and 8 year old girls enjoy making a batches of cupcakes with maker
customer_reviews.text: Our 11 year and 8 year old girls enjoy making a batches of cupcakes with maker. Easy cleanup and not having to turn on the oven are a great plus.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: wonderful color and the coolest auntee award given for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Quickly shipped..wonderful color and the coolest auntee award given for the best birthday gift EVERRR!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size muffins, brownies and snacks!
customer_reviews.text: Constantly making Jalapeno corn bread for dinner. Also make bite size brownies and muffins to share at work.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't really review this as it was given as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Quilter Pat

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Never flew it's up a little and then nose dive to the ground
customer_reviews.author: latoya

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids Labelled This a HIT
customer_reviews.text: The first thing the grandkids did when they received their BabyCakes Mini CupCake Make was make a BUNCH of CucCakes for thier classmates. Mom like the ease of clean up, and the kids did just fine with a smaller cupcake...not need for a big, over-sized cake. Just the thing for snacks...and school tredats.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cupcake maker is easy to use and clean and I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old daughter loves it and has used it many times! We also got the BabyCakes recipe book and we made mini tostadas. The cupcake maker is easy to use and clean and I highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: janine

customer_reviews.title: 10 year olds don't have the best cake batter aim
customer_reviews.text: Novelty in concept. It takes a loooong time to use up a box of cake mix in batches of 6 mini cupcakes. Purchased as gift for a 10 year old girl. 10 year olds don't have the best cake batter aim. Be prepared for cleanup. The paper baking cups seem to be a non-standard size. Purchased the smaller baking cups from the local grocery store. They work, but it's not a snug fit. So much easier to just bake in the oven, but you miss out on the novelty of doing the activity with a child .
customer_reviews.author: Tony Kay

customer_reviews.title: my grandaughter likes to bake
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 8 yr old granddaughter who enjoys cupcakes. This darling cupcake maker is safe for her to use and they come out great. She's happy with the purple machine and the fact that they are "mini". I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: neecie

customer_reviews.title: This came without an outer shipping box which almost ruined ...
customer_reviews.text: This came without an outer shipping box which almost ruined a Christmas surprise. It's what you'd expect from a one trick pony. We followed the recipe in the enclosed book and they were very dry even with following the directions. The cupcakes are smaller than average.
customer_reviews.author: David Farrar

customer_reviews.title: Someone read my comment?
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that my BabyCakes Maker was not what I expected. The BabyCakes people solved my questions promptly. I plan to make these babycakes with my 2 grandsons because they really like chocolate cake and there's more than chocolate cake recipesin the BabyCakes Mini CupCake cook book!
customer_reviews.author: VALENTINA M.

customer_reviews.title: Returning these
customer_reviews.text: My kids each got one for Christmas. I let them help mix the batter but the plates in the machine get very hot so I ended up baking the cupcakes. It took me almost an hour to bake 30 small cupcakes. I burned my fingers several times trying to get them out, I can't imagine letting the kids do this.I don't recommend this, I would rather fill the cupcake pans and put them in the oven, then the will be evenly baked.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Eazy Peezy!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy and fun item to use! My daughter and I used it to make mini-muffins using the Martha White Blueberry muffins pouch found in the baking section of our local grocery store. So easy to make and clean up was a breeze. This item can get very hot so make sure to supervise/help your young daughter / son to not get burned. All in all a fun and easy item to own.
customer_reviews.author: T Miles

customer_reviews.title: love it so much
customer_reviews.text: honestly i got this as a gift i use it to make pancakes cupcakes mini pies cornbread sometimes eggs its sooo great i would get more things from them the best thing ive put in my kitchen in a while
customer_reviews.author: Maegan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Its Purple and it Works!
customer_reviews.text: This is sooooo cute and it works just fine! I saw the purple and fell in love... but it is quite efficient and gives great cupcakes and muffin. Much easier than firing up the oven. Great idea that works terrific for me!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

product_meta.title: Babycakes Cupcake Maker (Purple)
product_meta.description: For fast and fun desserts, this Babycakes cupcake maker is a must-have. It’s exciting, easy-to-use design helps you bake 6 mini cupcakes in only a matter of minutes, so you'll be enjoying small tasty treats in no time. For birthday parties and other special occasions, this Babycakes cupcake maker is sure to be a hit. Nonstick baking plates keep messes to a minimum. Power and ready lights lend convenience. And as a bonus, the Babycakes Mini Cupcake maker includes a lifting fork and cupcake liners.
feature_bullets: Makes 6 mini-size cupcakes in just 5 to 8 minutes
Non-stick coated cavities make cleanup super easy
Power/Ready Lights lets you know when your cakes are done and Locking Latch for safety
Includes a Fork Tool and cupcake liners

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars25 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
